quotes.quote: Even the promiscuous feel pain.
As bees their sting, so the promiscuous leave behind them in each encounter something of themselves by which they are made to suffer.
Promiscuity turns sex into a sport, like arm-wrestling.
Men are more moral than they think and far more immoral than they can imagine.
Promiscuity is like never reading past the first page. Monogamy is like reading the same book over and over.
Variety is the spice of love.
Don't lose a diamond because you're busy collecting stones.
Promiscuity is the death of love.

The fact that the person who you are sleeping with is also sleeping with another person or other people does not necessarily mean that he or she does not love you. And the fact that you are the only person who someone is sleeping with does not necessarily mean that he or she loves you.
The sexual freedom of today for most people is really only a convention, an obligation, a social duty, a social anxiety, a necessary feature of the consumer's way of life.
The danger in promiscuity is that it's always barking at your heels.
You know, women are as promiscuous as men and yet, of course, people are inhibited from having an affair or a relationship because the real-world consequences are a drag.
Once is a man's life, for one mortal moment, he must make a grab for immorality; if not; he has not lived.

Cheating in relationship is a sign of self-regulation failure. When it happens ones, it is a mistake. When it happens twice, it is unfortunate. But when it happens thrice or more, it is a pattern indicating primitive, uncivilized inhuman behavior.
Fish in another man's pond and you will catch crabs.
A promiscuous person is a person who is getting more sex than you are.
Women never know what they want. Men never know what they have.
Everything good in life is either immoral, illegal or fattening.
You were born with your legs apart. They'll send you to the grave in a Y-shaped coffin.
To be ashamed of one's immorality: that is a step on the staircase at whose end one is also ashamed of one's morality.
There is no such thing as morality or immorality in thought. There is immoral emotion.
A lack of boundaries invites a lack of respect.
Either one is promiscuous or in a relationship - it cannot be both at the same time.
Promiscuity does not equal sexual empowerment. Celibacy does not equal lack of it. It is in the quality, not quantity, that we empower ourselves sexually.
The definition of promiscuity? One more partner than you've ever had.
Promiscuity in men may cheapen love but sharpen thought. Promiscuity in women is illness, a leakage of identity.
Good girls go to heaven, bad girls go everywhere.
The only immorality is not to do when one hast to do it.
Boredom is often the cause of promiscuity, and always its result.
Girls who say "lots of guys are after me" should never forget that low prices attract the most customers.
